mapper.update: UPDATE sys_field SET list = #{list}, query = #{query}, sort_index = #{sortIndex} WHERE fname = #{fname}
mapper.select: SELECT fname, sname, name, stype, ftype, dist_type AS distType, dist_key AS distKey, tree_level AS treeLevel, list, query, layer_width AS layerWidth, sort_index AS sortIndex FROM sys_field ORDER BY sort_index
